text: The staff which maintains the Child Protection Register may release information from said Register for research and evaluation only upon an order of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia; provided, however, that no information identifying the persons named in a report shall be made available to the researcher or evaluator.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 6-2114.

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 4-1302.04

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Prevention of Child Abuse and Neglect.

heading.catch_text: Release of information for research and evaluation.
